channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Premiere Pro CC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Premiere Pro CC

item.title: CVE-2019-7931|2024-08-04T21:02:19.483Z -- adobe -- adobe%20premiere%20pro%20cc
item.description: Adobe Premiere Pro CC versions 13.1.2 and earlier have an insecure library loading (dll hijacking) vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
